mapper.select:
SELECT A.store_cd, A.tran_serial_no AS receiptNo, A.tran_date AS date, A.sale_serial_no, A.sale_amount AS amt, B.num, A.pos_id FROM SA0010 A, ( SELECT count (S.tran_serial_no) as num FROM SA0010 S WHERE S.store_cd = #{storeNo} AND S.tran_serial_no in
CAST(#{receiptNo} AS integer)
AND S.tran_type = 'sale' ) B WHERE A.store_cd = #{storeNo} AND A.tran_serial_no in
CAST(#{receiptNo} AS integer)
AND A.tran_type = 'sale'
ORDER BY acc_date LIMIT ${rows} OFFSET ${limitStart}

SELECT A.acc_id, A.acc_date, A.store_cd, A.customer_name, A.company_name, A.tax, A.address, A.phone, A.email, A.phone2, A.email2, A.receipt_no, A.amt, A.status, C.emp_name AS issue_user_id, A.issue_ymd, A.issue_hms, B.emp_name AS create_user_id, A.create_ymd, A.create_hms, A.pos_id FROM sa0230 A LEFT JOIN MA4200 B ON A.create_user_id = B.emp_num_id LEFT JOIN MA4200 C ON A.issue_user_id = C.emp_num_id WHERE A.acc_id = #{accId} AND A.store_cd = #{storeNo} limit 1

SELECT C.article_id, C.article_name, B.sale_qty AS qty, B.sale_amount AS amt, E.num FROM SA0010 A, SA0020 B, MA1100 C, CM9060 D, ( SELECT COUNT (B.article_id) AS num FROM SA0010 A, SA0020 B, MA1100 C, CM9060 D WHERE A.tran_serial_no = CAST(#{param.receiptNo} AS integer) AND A.store_cd = #{param.storeNo} AND D.sp_id = '0000' AND A.tran_serial_no = B.tran_serial_no AND A.store_cd = B.store_cd AND B.article_id = C.article_id AND D.sp_value BETWEEN C.effective_start_date AND C.effective_end_date AND B.detail_type = 's' AND A.pos_id = #{param.posId} ) E WHERE A.tran_serial_no = CAST(#{param.receiptNo} AS integer) AND A.store_cd = #{param.storeNo} AND D.sp_id = '0000' AND A.tran_serial_no = B.tran_serial_no AND A.store_cd = B.store_cd AND B.article_id = C.article_id AND D.sp_value BETWEEN C.effective_start_date AND C.effective_end_date AND B.detail_type = 's' AND A.pos_id = #{param.posId}
ORDER BY B.sale_seq_no LIMIT ${param.rows} OFFSET ${param.limitStart}
